text: Jorge Santibáñez Ceardi (1 March 1934 – 30 July 2020) was a Chilean politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Party. He was a Deputy from 1965 to 1973. He was Mayor of Viña del Mar from 1994 to 1996. Santibáñez Ceardi died at the age of 86 on 30 July 2020. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chilean mayors
title: Jorge Santibáñez Ceardi
